titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Namibia
Namibia

div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no specific legislation governing the declassification of Foreign Policy material.

div.head: Location
div.p: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Private Bag 13347, Windhoek, Namibia

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact the Namibian Foreign Ministry directly to inquire about access to foreign policy documents, but should also contact the South African National Archives in Pretoria for their holdings.
